name: Fnf sonic exe mod remaster.
description:
Original mod makers are listed in the cutscene that normally plays at the beginning of the mod!

This remaster is basically the same with some differences, these include. 

1.     5K Blacksun.

2.     4K difficult version of "You can't run".

2.     A little bit of difficulty curve compared to the main mod.

3.     Sunshine with added gimmick 

4.     Faker re-chart 

5.    Some sprite changes here and there.

If you want this game taken down then I will take it down, if you own anything I used then I can get rid of it.

Alt +f4 for secret
